revised_title: New Pneumatical Experiments on Respiration and Rarefaction
tldr: The author conducted experiments on animals in rarefied air to study the effects of respiration and rarefaction. They observed various responses in animals, including convulsions, vomiting, and survival in low-oxygen environments. These experiments contributed to the understanding of respiration and the role of air in animal life processes.
